Researcher Lorain:
Go to the 3rd tower of the Marshlands and destroy magical creatures. These include Port, Accuro, Recensio, Krator, the Face of Chaos. After killing them, You will find all You need.
Collect Mysterious Sparkling Shards (30 PCs.). Then look at the 3rd floor of the Mage Tower of Ivory Jansen. I think he will be happy to help and will carry out the study.
Oh yeah! To get to the 3rd floor, turn to the Magician of the Ivory Tower Krasus.
